sentences.en: An irradiation of 60 sec. limits the build - up of excessive gamma radiation levels.
sentences.cn: 采取60秒辐射限定了剩余伽玛射线水平的增高.

sentences.en: Consequently, gamma rays will reach a particular target on the ground from many directions.
sentences.cn: 这样, γ射线必将从四面八方射达某一指定的地面目标.

sentences.en: Further, both gamma rays and neutrons can produce harmful effects in living organisms.
sentences.cn: 此外, r射线和中子都能损害生物组织.

sentences.en: Gamma Knife surgery has recently been tried as an alternative to surgical extirpation.
sentences.cn: 伽玛刀治疗最近被尝试作为手术根治之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: Heavy metals, such as iron and lead, make good gamma - ray shields because of their high density.
sentences.cn: 重金属像铁、铅等由于密度很大,都是防护γ射线的最好的防护材料.

sentences.en: However the major portion of the initial gamma radiation is derived from the two latter sources.
sentences.cn: 可是绝大部分早期γ辐射来自后两种来源.

sentences.en: If gamma particles are present, potential differences of several thousand volts can be generated.
sentences.cn: 如果存在γ粒子, 可能产生几千伏的电位差.

sentences.en: In a vacuum, gamma rays travel in straight lines with the speed of light.
sentences.cn: 真空中, γ射线以光速沿直线前进.

sentences.en: Missing gamma - ray bursts are one of the top mysteries on the agenda.
sentences.cn: 失踪的γ射线爆发是会议议程中的重点之一.

sentences.en: Strictly speaking, it is not possible to absorb gamma rays completely.
sentences.cn: 严格来说, 不可能把γ射线全部吸收掉.

sentences.en: The biological effects of various gamma - radiation doses will be considered more fully in Chapter XI.
sentences.cn: 在第十一章中还要更全面地讨论不同辐射剂量的生物效能.

sentences.en: The instantaneous gamma rays are produced almost entirely before the weapon has completely blown apart.
sentences.cn: 瞬时γ射线差不多是在武器完全飞散之前就全部产生了.

sentences.en: The scanner calibration variables including brightness , contrast, gamma value, the white balance.
sentences.cn: 扫描仪需订正的不恒度次要包罗亮度 、 差比度(伽马值) 、 不黑不均.

sentences.en: These regions were then targeted with high - dose radiation from a Gamma Knife.
sentences.cn: 这些区域然后施以伽码刀的集中照射治疗.

sentences.en: Unimmunized contacts, especially infants, should receive 2 to 4 ml. of hyperimmue gamma globulin intramuscularly.
sentences.cn: 未经免疫的接触者, 尤其是婴儿, 应接受2～4毫升高度免疫性的丙种球蛋白肌肉注射.

words.tran_cn: 微克；希腊语的第三个字母

phrases.tran_cn: 丙种球蛋白；伽玛球蛋白

trans.tran_cn: 希腊字母表的第三个字母，微克，[物]伽马，[虫]V纹蛾
